text:
With phase 0 of the #covid19 #vaccination program now in effect #PUMS doctors, dentists, nurses, EMTs and other frontline workers - including Rector Tykarski - are taking their first shots of the Pfizer/BioNTech #vaccine recently approved by the EMA.

Photos: PAP/J. Kaczmarczyk https://t.co/VaBv28rnXm
